Header.title: Impact Auto Systems
Header.paragraph: Crafting innovative automation solutions with over 15 years of expertise. Specializing in Special Purpose Machines, Injection Moulding, and more.

About.paragraph: We are a passionate team of professionals dedicated to pushing the boundaries of innovation in the field of automation and machine building. With decades of combined experience, we pride ourselves on our ability to deliver cutting-edge solutions tailored to meet the unique needs of our clients. Our commitment to excellence is evident in every project we undertake, from designing and manufacturing special purpose machines to providing comprehensive automation solutions. At our core, we believe in the power of collaboration and strive to cultivate long-lasting relationships with our clients, built on trust, integrity, and a shared vision for success. Together, we are shaping the future of automation, one innovative solution at a time.

Services.text: Our electrical panel wiring services ensure optimal functionality and safety for your machinery.

Services.text: We offer comprehensive PLC programming solutions for all types of automation systems.

Services.text: We design and manufacture high-quality machine tools and accessories for various industries.

Services.name: Conveyors & Material Handling
Services.text: Our conveyor and material handling systems ensure smooth and efficient operations.

Services.name: Leak Test Rigs
Services.text: Our leak test rigs, both wet and dry, ensure the quality and reliability of your products.

Team.name: M.Palanivel
Team.description: Palanivel started his career at TVS Wabco in 2009, then worked as an SPM Project Engineer at Dynamic Techno System from 2010 to 2018. In 2019, he founded Impact Auto Components, which has efficiently supplied all OEMs for six years under his leadership.
Team.alt: M.Palanivel Founder of Impact auto components
